Forbidden.title: You don't have access to this page
Forbidden.text: Ask your admin if you think you should have access.

InternalServerError.title: Workleap is not working properly right now
InternalServerError.text: You expect more from us, and so do we. So we're working hard to bring back the experience you deserve.

ChunkLoadError.title: The screen you're looking for wasn't found
ChunkLoadError.text: It's likely the page was recently updated and the browser needs to be reloaded. You can reload now or go back to your previous page.

NotFound.title: Does anyone even know what '404 error' means?
NotFound.line-1: Instead, maybe we'll call this our 'we're so sorry' page. We are Canadian, after all!
NotFound.line-2: Try going back to <HomeLink>Workleap</HomeLink>. If you still can't find what you need, contact <ContactLink>Support</ContactLink>.

PreventNavigationModal.heading: Discard your changes?
PreventNavigationModal.content: If you leave, any changes you made will be lost.
